name: Domino Trainer
description:
If you enjoy playing all fives dominoes, but feel you can beat most AIs out there, try this one!

Features:

  • Various AIs to choose from, differing in difficulty and game play
  • Detailled statistics on your play that help you track your performance
  • Most common game variants can be dialed in

The game has minimal distractions, leaving you focussed on the game, which means you can start playing right when the game opens.
